name: using-superpowers
description: Use when starting any conversation - establishes how to find and use skills, requiring Skill tool invocation before ANY response including clarifying questions

conversationContext.description: The initial user message or request that starts the conversation

taskType.description: The type of task being requested (e.g., 'question', 'implementation', 'debugging', 'exploration')

potentialSkills.description: List of skill IDs that might apply to this conversation (even at 1% probability)

skillsToInvoke.description: Ordered list of skills that should be invoked for this conversation

purpose.description: Why this skill is being invoked

priority.description: Priority order (1=highest, process skills first, then implementation)

skillType.description: Whether the skill is rigid (follow exactly) or flexible (adapt principles)

workflowEstablished.description: Whether the skill usage workflow has been established for the conversation

redFlagsDetected.description: Any rationalization red flags that were detected and avoided

nextAction.description: The immediate next action to take (e.g., 'invoke_skill', 'respond', 'create_todos')

triggers: starting any conversation - establishes how to find and use skills, requiring skill tool invocation before any response including clarifying questions
